input_text:
Job Title: Growth Lead

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
About the job
About Endue:Endue is a rapidly growing healthcare technology company focused on empowering infusion operators with world-class tools. Our mission is to empower providers with innovative technology solutions that streamline processes, enhance collaboration and drive profitability so providers can focus on what matters most: their patients. We are seeking an experienced Growth Lead to join our dynamic team and contribute to our mission of transforming the expectations infusion operators should have for their software.
Responsibilities:As a Growth Lead at Endue, you will play a crucial role in interacting with current and prospective clients, iterating and moving product features forward in collaboration with engineering and design teams and contributing to thought leadership. Your primary responsibilities will include:
Industry Expertise:Utilize your deep understanding of infusion processes, including patient registration, intake activities, scheduling, clinical documentation, billing and reporting.Stay updated on industry trends, emerging therapies, and best practices related to infusion software and workflows.Act as a subject matter expert and provide insights and guidance to the product development team.
Prospective Sales Support (65%):Collaborate and act as a part of the Endue sales team to win new business and onboard new customers to the Endue platform.Travel to industry conferences and client on-sites. 
Customer Engagement and Support (30%):Engage with customers, industry professionals, and stakeholders to understand their pain points, challenges, and needs.Conduct training and sales demos and presentations to showcase Endue’s software and its value proposition.Provide training, support, and guidance to customers in adopting and maximizing the use of Endue’s software solutions.
Content Creation (5%):Contribute to thought leadership content, including blog posts, whitepapers, and industry presentations, to establish Endue as a trusted authority in infusion management.Represent Endue at industry events, conferences, and webinars to share insights and network with industry professionals.Act as an ambassador for Endue, building relationships with industry influencers and fostering partnerships.
Requirements:Bachelor's degree or equivalent industry experience.Proven experience in infusion roles, including intake, oversight and clinical acumen if not clinical.Strong knowledge of infusion software and tools, such as EMRs, practice management, healthcare CRM solutions.Experience in product management or a strong understanding of product development processes.Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to articulate complex concepts in a clear and concise manner.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify opportunities, drive insights, and make data-driven decisions.Ability to work collaboratively across teams, bridging the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders.Passion for innovation, technology, and driving positive change in the infusion industry.
If you are a passionate industry professional with a strong understanding of infusion workflows and the desire to shape the future of infusion software, we want to hear from you. 
Join the Endue team and be part of our mission to empower providers with game-changing technology solutions.
To apply, please submit your resume here.
Note: Only candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.
Benefits:Competitive salary, equity, and the opportunity to build an amazing company from the ground upRemote-first workplaceRoutine team meetupsUnlimited PTO

Experience Level (if available): None

Travel to industry conferences and client on-sites

Provide training and support to customers
